1370: Stoethoute was born in Uterechse straet in 1370.
Got married to Tetta at age 28 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Tetta, Segherarden, at age 28.
1371: Had a daughter with Tetta, Alretieren, at age 29.
1373: Had a son with Tetta, Rembrecht, at age 31.
1376: Had a daughter with Tetta, Auesoete, at age 34.
1379: Lost his wife Tetta while she was giving birth to Myrthel in 1379.
1382: Lost daughter Segherarden when Segherarden was 13 years old.
Lost daughter Myrthel when Myrthel was 4 years old.
